content: PBH SD CRC Self-drilling drywall screws Single exterior sheathing screw (corrosion-resistant coating) for fastening into metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy to drive due to excellent drilling capability Reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits â€“ helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti drill-point drywall screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Corrosion resistance tested to 1000 hours of salt-spray testing as per ASTM B117 Applications Fastening exterior sheathing boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) Fastening fiberglass-faced panel boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Bugle head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Bugle head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution ### ITEMS- 411517 - Ext sheathing screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC - Package Size 8000 pc - 413489 - Ext sheathing screw 6 x 1-7/8 PBH SD CRC - Package Size 4000 pc
